sentences.en: Class 8 Hand tools and implements ( hand operated ); cutlery; side arms; razors.
sentences.cn: 商标注册类别8手工用具和器械 ( 工操作的 ) 刀叉餐具; 佩刀, 剃刀.

sentences.en: Class 8 Hand tools and implements ( hand operated ); cutlery; side arms; razors.
sentences.cn: 商标注册类别8手工用具和器械 ( 手工操作的 ); 刀叉餐具; 佩刀, 剃刀.

sentences.en: Cutlery, Knife, Manicure and Beauty Set, Scissors , and Kitchen Tools . Shawls - Pashmina.
sentences.cn: 采购产品餐具, 刀, 修指甲和美容一套, 剪刀, 和厨房的工具.

sentences.en: For silver and silverplate, including cutlery, serving dishes table decorations etc.
sentences.cn: 适用于失去光泽的银器如餐具、盘碟及其它用品如刀具 、 餐碟,装饰品等.

sentences.en: He felt a real country bumpkin, sitting in that expensive restaurant, not knowing which cutlery to use.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己像个土老帽儿, 坐在高级餐厅里, 不知道该用哪一件餐具.

sentences.en: Manufacturing sales: chemical fiber cutlery , built CD, mechanical equipment and accessories.
sentences.cn: 制造销售: 化纤刀具 、 滤芯碟片 、 机械设备及配件.

sentences.en: She arranged plates and cutlery on a small table.
sentences.cn: 她在一张小桌上摆好盘子和餐具。

sentences.en: She laid the table with glasses, plates and cutlery.
sentences.cn: 她在桌上铺好了酒杯 、 盘子和餐具.

sentences.en: Shef - field is famous for its cutlery.
Tables are set with white china and gold-banded silver cutlery.
sentences.cn: 桌上摆放着白色瓷器和镶着金边的银制餐具。

sentences.en: The top drawer is the one with the cutlery in.
sentences.cn: 最上面的抽屉是放刀叉的.

sentences.en: There was a serving spoon missing when Nina put the cutlery back in its box.
sentences.cn: 当妮娜将银餐具装回盒子中时，少了一把分菜用的匙子。

sentences.en: This drawer contains all the cutlery [ 5 kQtlEri ] we own.
sentences.cn: 这个抽屉里盛放着我们所有的 刀叉 餐具.

sentences.en: We keep the cutlery in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 我们把刀叉放在厨房里.

sentences.en: Workers must send their cutlery set to the dishwashing area.
sentences.cn: 员工就餐完毕必须主动将餐具送至洗碗处.

sentences.en: You should use your cutlery in the right order.
sentences.cn: 使用食具要按照正确的顺序.

trans.tran_en: knives, forks, and spoons that you use for eating and serving food
